Sentencas: In LaNbO4, Sm, Gd and Yb were investigated as substitutes to enhance its ion conductivity, for its application in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Enhanced electrical conductivity of LaNbO4 by A-site substitution

Sentencas: La0.9M0.1NbO4 (M = Sm, Gd, Yb) was prepared via a solid state reaction route and single phase was attained by calcining the constituent oxides at 1200 degrees C for 5 h. The total conductivity of LaNbO4 was increased by partly replaced La with Sm, Gd and Yb, due to the muti-valences of the substitutions.
Titulo: Enhanced electrical conductivity of LaNbO4 by A-site substitution

Sentencas: The highest conductivity (1.76 x 10(-4) S cm(-1)) was achieved for La0.9Sm0.1NbO4 at 800 degrees C in wet air, more than one order higher compared to that of LaNbO4.
Titulo: Enhanced electrical conductivity of LaNbO4 by A-site substitution

Sentencas: The introduction of Sm, Gd or Yb also slightly increased the ion transport number of LaNbO4, indicating that the increase of the total conductivity was mainly contributed by the enhanced ion conductivity, which was beneficial for its application as a pure ion conductor.
Titulo: Enhanced electrical conductivity of LaNbO4 by A-site substitution
